Uses of Package
brave.sampler

Packages that use brave.sampler 
Package Description
brave  
brave.sampler  
  • Classes in brave.sampler used by brave 
    Class Description
    Sampler
    Sampler is responsible for deciding if a particular trace should be "sampled", i.e.
    SamplerFunction
    Decides whether to start a new trace based on request properties such as an HTTP path.
  • Classes in brave.sampler used by brave.sampler 
    Class Description
    DeclarativeSampler
    This is an implementation of how to decide whether to trace a request using annotations on a java method.
    DeclarativeSampler.ProbabilityOfMethod  
    DeclarativeSampler.RateForMethod
    Deprecated.
    since 5.8, use DeclarativeSampler.ProbabilityOfMethod
    DeclarativeSampler.RateOfMethod  
    Matcher
    Returns true if this rule matches the input parameters
    ParameterizedSampler
    This is an implementation of how to decide whether to trace a request using ordered rules.
    ParameterizedSampler.Builder  
    ParameterizedSampler.Rule
    Deprecated.
    Since 5.8, use ParameterizedSampler.Builder.putRule(Matcher, Sampler)
    Sampler
    Sampler is responsible for deciding if a particular trace should be "sampled", i.e.
    SamplerFunction
    Decides whether to start a new trace based on request properties such as an HTTP path.
